statements: SELECT contestant_id, contestant_name, contestant_location, contestant_specialty FROM contestant_profiles;
SELECT * FROM contestant_profiles WHERE contestant_location = 'New York';
SELECT contestant_name, contestant_specialty FROM contestant_profiles ORDER BY contestant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM contestant_profiles WHERE contestant_specialty = 'Singing' ORDER BY contestant_id DESC;
SELECT contestant_name, contestant_location FROM contestant_profiles WHERE contestant_specialty = 'Dancing';
SELECT * FROM contestant_profiles WHERE contestant_id = 1;
SELECT contestant_name, contestant_location FROM contestant_profiles WHERE contestant_specialty = 'Singing';
SELECT contestant_id, contestant_name, contestant_location FROM contestant_profiles ORDER BY contestant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM contestant_profiles WHERE contestant_location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles');
SELECT contestant_id AS id, contestant_name AS name, contestant_location AS location FROM contestant_profiles WHERE contestant_specialty = 'Dancing';
SELECT * FROM contestant_profiles WHERE name = 'Alice';
SELECT contestant_id, name, age FROM contestant_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM judging_scores WHERE taste_score > 8.0 ORDER BY taste_score DESC;
SELECT contestant_id, overall_score FROM judging_scores WHERE episode_id = 3 AND judge_id = 1;
SELECT contestant_id, name, location FROM contestant_profiles ORDER BY name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM contestant_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT contestant_id, name, location FROM contestant_profiles WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY contestant_id;

SELECT contestant_id, name, age, location FROM contestant_profiles JOIN judging_scores ON contestant_profiles.contestant_id = judging_scores.contestant_id WHERE taste_score > 8 ORDER BY contestant_id, judge_id;

SELECT contestant_id, name, age, SUM(overall_score) AS total_score FROM contestant_profiles JOIN judging_scores ON contestant_profiles.contestant_id = judging_scores.contestant_id GROUP BY contestant_id HAVING COUNT(episode_id) > 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_contestants, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM contestant_profiles;
SELECT * FROM contestant_profiles;
SELECT contestant_name, age FROM contestant_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT contestant_name, hometown FROM contestant_profiles WHERE hometown='New York';
SELECT episode_name, air_date FROM episodes ORDER BY air_date DESC;
SELECT contestant_name, score FROM contestant_profiles JOIN judging_scores ON contestant_profiles.contestant_id = judging_scores.contestant_id WHERE score > 8.0;
SELECT * FROM contestant_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT contestant_name, hometown FROM contestant_profiles WHERE contestant_id = 3;
SELECT contestant_name, age, hometown FROM contestant_profiles WHERE age <= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT episode_name, air_date, score FROM episodes JOIN judging_scores ON episodes.episode_id = judging_scores.episode_id WHERE judge_id = 1;
SELECT contestant_name, score FROM contestant_profiles JOIN judging_scores ON contestant_profiles.contestant_id = judging_scores.contestant_id WHERE score > 8.5;
SELECT * FROM contestant_profiles;
SELECT contestant_name, age FROM contestant_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT episode_name, air_date FROM episode_schedules ORDER BY air_date DESC;
SELECT contestant_name, score FROM contestant_profiles JOIN judging_scores ON contestant_profiles.contestant_id = judging_scores.contestant_id;
SELECT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM season_info;
SELECT * FROM contestant_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY contestant_name DESC;
SELECT contestant_name, city FROM contestant_profiles WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT episode_name, air_date FROM episode_schedules WHERE air_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY air_date ASC;
SELECT contestant_name, score FROM contestant_profiles JOIN judging_scores ON contestant_profiles.contestant_id = judging_scores.contestant_id;
SELECT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM season_info ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM episode_schedule;
SELECT contestant_name, age FROM contestant_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT contestant_name, occupation FROM contestant_profiles WHERE occupation = 'Chef';
SELECT judge_name, score FROM judging_scores WHERE judge_id = 1;

SELECT contestant_name, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM contestant_profiles JOIN contestant_achievements ON contestant_profiles.contestant_id = contestant_achievements.contestant_id WHERE achievement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contestant_name, age FROM contestant_profiles WHERE occupation = 'Lawyer';
SELECT episode_id, episode_date, location FROM episode_schedule ORDER BY episode_date DESC;

SELECT contestant_name, age, occupation, episode_id FROM contestant_profiles JOIN episode_contestants ON contestant_profiles.contestant_id = episode_contestants.contestant_id WHERE eliminated = FALSE;
SELECT judge_name, score FROM judging_scores WHERE score > 8.0;

SELECT contestant_name, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM contestant_profiles JOIN contestant_achievements ON contestant_profiles.contestant_id = contestant_achievements.contestant_id WHERE contestant_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY achievement_date;
